sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_474a55eadbe143007c7c771c8c96193a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator</name><script><![CDATA[var tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator = Class.create();

tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(tm_BaseDecorator, {
	testInstances: function() {
		var testInstance = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		testInstance.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		testInstance.orderBy('order');
		testInstance.query();
		return testInstance;
	},
	
	testPlan: function() {
		var testPlan = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_PLAN);
		testPlan.get(this.getValue(tm_TestManagement.TEST_PLAN_FK));
		return tm_Decorator.decorate(testPlan);
	},
	
	metricCategory: function() {
		if ( JSUtil.nil(this.getValue(tm_TestManagement.ASMT_METRIC_CATEGORY)) ) {
			return { isValid: function() { return false; } };
		}
		else {
			var gr = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.ASMT_METRIC_CATEGORY);
			gr.get(this.getValue(tm_TestManagement.ASMT_METRIC_CATEGORY));
			return tm_Decorator.decorate(gr);
		}
	},
	
	clearBlockedReason: function() {
		this.setValue('blocked_reason', "");
		this.update();
	},
	
	
	//Start customization
	//Original "addTest" function
	/*
	addTest: function(test,testWorkflow) {
		var testInstance = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		testInstance.test = test.getValue('test');
		testInstance.test_description = test.getValue('test_description');
		testInstance.order = test.getValue('order');
		testInstance.expected_result = test.getValue('expected_result');
		testInstance.tm_test_case_instance = this.gr.getValue('sys_id');
		if(!this.metricCategory().isValid() && !testWorkflow)
		 testInstance.setWorkflow(false);
		testInstance.insert();
		return tm_Decorator.decorate(testInstance);
	},
	*/
	//New "addTest" function to add the Test Instance to the appropriate table
	addTest: function(test,testWorkflow) {
		//check if the source Test is from the out of box "Test" table or the custom "KPMG Test" table
		var kpmgTest = new GlideRecord('x_10565_kpmgdevops_kpmg_test');
		if(kpmgTest.get(test.getUniqueValue())){
			//record is on the KPMG Story table so create the Test Instance on the custom KPMG Test Instance table
			var kpmgTestInstance = new GlideRecord('x_10565_kpmgdevops_kpmg_test_instance');
			kpmgTestInstance.test = test.getValue('test');
			kpmgTestInstance.test_description = test.getValue('test_description');
			kpmgTestInstance.order = test.getValue('order');
			kpmgTestInstance.expected_result = test.getValue('expected_result');
			kpmgTestInstance.tm_test_case_instance = this.gr.getValue('sys_id');
			kpmgTestInstance.u_story = kpmgTest.u_story;//copy over the Story from the KPMG Test to the KPMG Test Instance
			kpmgTestInstance.u_test = test.getUniqueValue();//copy over the source Test into the KPMG Test Instance
			if(!this.metricCategory().isValid() && !testWorkflow)
			 kpmgTestInstance.setWorkflow(false);
			kpmgTestInstance.insert();
			return tm_Decorator.decorate(kpmgTestInstance);
		}
		else {
			//source Test is NOT on the KPMG Story table, so create the Test Instance on the baseline Test Instance table
			var testInstance = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
			testInstance.test = test.getValue('test');
			testInstance.test_description = test.getValue('test_description');
			testInstance.order = test.getValue('order');
			testInstance.expected_result = test.getValue('expected_result');
			testInstance.tm_test_case_instance = this.gr.getValue('sys_id');
			if(!this.metricCategory().isValid() && !testWorkflow)
			 testInstance.setWorkflow(false);
			testInstance.insert();
			return tm_Decorator.decorate(testInstance);
		}
	},//end customization
	
	blockedTests: function() {
		var tests = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		tests.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		tests.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.BLOCKED);
		tests.query();
		return tests;
	},
	
	blockedTestsCount: function() {
		var blockedTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		count.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		count.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.BLOCKED);
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if ( count.next() )
			blockedTestsCount = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return blockedTestsCount;
	},
	
	failedTests: function() {
		var tests = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		tests.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		tests.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.FAILED);
		tests.query();
		return tests;
	},
	
	failedTestsCount: function() {
		var failedTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		count.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		count.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.FAILED);
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if ( count.next() )
			failedTestsCount = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return failedTestsCount;
	},
	
	passedTestsCount: function() {
		var passedTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		count.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		count.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.PASSED);
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if ( count.next() )
			passedTestsCount = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return passedTestsCount;
	},
	
	unexecutedTestsCount: function() {
		var unexecutedTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		count.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		count.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.UNEXECUTED);
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if ( count.next() )
			unexecutedTestsCount = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return unexecutedTestsCount;
	},
	
	totalTestsCount: function() {
		var totalTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		count.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if ( count.next() )
			totalTestsCount = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return totalTestsCount;
	},
	
	getTableName: function() {
		return tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE;
	},
	
	updateActualResult: function(message) {
		// Dummy Method for this wrapper
	},
	
	updateBlockedReason: function(message) {
		this.setValue('blocked_reason', message);
	},
	
	setExecutionStatus: function(state) {
		this.setValue('execution_status', state);
	},
	
	type: 'tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-04 16:47:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>474a55eadbe143007c7c771c8c96193a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_474a55eadbe143007c7c771c8c96193a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-05 20:56:15</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>global.tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator</name><script><![CDATA[var tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator = Class.create();

tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(tm_BaseDecorator, {
	testInstances: function() {
		var testInstance = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		testInstance.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		testInstance.orderBy('order');
		testInstance.query();
		return testInstance;
	},
	
	testPlan: function() {
		var testPlan = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_PLAN);
		testPlan.get(this.getValue(tm_TestManagement.TEST_PLAN_FK));
		return tm_Decorator.decorate(testPlan);
	},
	
	metricCategory: function() {
		if ( JSUtil.nil(this.getValue(tm_TestManagement.ASMT_METRIC_CATEGORY)) ) {
			return { isValid: function() { return false; } };
		}
		else {
			var gr = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.ASMT_METRIC_CATEGORY);
			gr.get(this.getValue(tm_TestManagement.ASMT_METRIC_CATEGORY));
			return tm_Decorator.decorate(gr);
		}
	},
	
	clearBlockedReason: function() {
		this.setValue('blocked_reason', "");
		this.update();
	},
	
	addTest: function(test,testWorkflow) {
		var testInstance = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);

		testInstance.test_description = test.getValue('test_description');
		testInstance.order = test.getValue('order');

		return tests;
	},
	
	blockedTestsCount: function() {
		var blockedTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		count.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		count.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.BLOCKED);
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if ( count.next() )
			blockedTestsCount = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return blockedTestsCount;
	},
	
	failedTests: function() {
		var tests = new GlideRecord(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		tests.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		tests.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.FAILED);
		tests.query();
		return tests;
	},
	
	failedTestsCount: function() {
		var failedTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		count.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		count.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.FAILED);
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if ( count.next() )
			failedTestsCount = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return failedTestsCount;
	},
	
	passedTestsCount: function() {
		var passedTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		count.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		count.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.PASSED);
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if ( count.next() )
			passedTestsCount = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return passedTestsCount;
	},
	
	unexecutedTestsCount: function() {
		var unexecutedTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);
		count.addQuery(tm_TestManagement.TEST_CASE_INSTANCE_FK, this.gr.getValue(tm_TestManagement.SYS_ID));
		count.addQuery('execution_status', tm_TestManagement.UNEXECUTED);
		count.addAggregate('COUNT');
		count.query();
		if ( count.next() )
			unexecutedTestsCount = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
		return unexecutedTestsCount;
	},
	
	totalTestsCount: function() {
		var totalTestsCount = 0;
		var count = new GlideAggregate(tm_TestManagement.TEST_INSTANCE);

});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-05-30 07:04:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>1b94c9f0370121001a8326877e41f152</sys_id><sys_mod_count>86</sys_mod_count><sys_name>tm_TestCaseInstanceDecorator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Test Management" source="com.snc.test_mgmt">ee21a3b8db2103007c7c771c8c961901</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1b94c9f0370121001a8326877e41f152</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-04 16:47:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="number" table="tm_test_instance"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes>edge_encryption_enabled=true</attributes><audit>false</audit><calculation/><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Number</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value>javascript:getNextObjNumberPadded();</default_value><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>true</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value
